main event: Observers reported seeing a bright circular object with a whitish haze over Cape Vincent, New York, on 11-6-67.
interesting points: The object hovered for a brief period before moving upward and then horizontally into a cloud., Observers noted the object was approximately 50 feet in diameter., The sighting occurred under partly cloudy conditions with good visibility., Local sheriff investigated and took witness statements., Initial conclusion was that the observer misidentified flares being fired at Camp Drum.
witness description: The report does not contain specific witness names or descriptions.
